data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Thread::Pool::Simple is a simplified version of Thread::Pool. The
    purpose is to reduce complex module dependencies. Thread::Pool
    depends on about 5 other CPAN Modules, and some tests are failed
    with latest perl.

    However, Thread::Pool::Simple only uses core perl modules, and
    provides more simple and stable functionalities.
